target_id: directs and exercises authoritative or dominating influence over some thing that is also owned
OwnershipAndControl.rdf version of the ontology was modified to better integrate it with the situation pattern and eliminate circular definitions.
OwnershipAndControl.rdf version of the ontology was modified to address hygiene issues with respect to text formatting.
situation in which some party owns and controls something
OwnershipAndControl.rdf version of the ontology was modified to use the Commons Ontology Library (Commons) Annotation Vocabulary rather than the OMG's Specification Metadata vocabulary.
relates something to the party that owns, influences, manages and directs it
OwnershipAndControl.rdf version of the ontology was modified to integrate the properties defined herein with the ownership and control patterns.
This ontology brings the concepts of ownership and control together, in cases where the combined semantics are applicable, such as for a wholly owned subsidiary.

basic rule: if x controls y and x owns y then x owns and controls y
SWRL rule: controls(?x, ?y), owns(?x, ?y) -> ownsAndControls(?x, ?y)
OwnershipAndControl.rdf version of the ontology was modified to replace content that is now available in the OMG Commons Ontology Library (Commons) v1.1 (FND-380).
